mapper.select: SELECT con.*,pos.wgs84_lng wgs84Lng,pos.wgs84_lat wgs84Lat,pos.id positionId FROM ( SELECT u.id usersId,u.`name`,u.id_number idNumber,ul.license,ul.address FROM users u INNER JOIN user_license ul ON area = 2 AND u.phone = ul.phone ) con INNER JOIN position pos on wgs84_lng is not NULL and wgs84_lat is not NULL and con.license = pos.license

SELECT a.*,pos.wgs84_lng wgs84Lng,pos.wgs84_lat wgs84Lat FROM (SELECT u.*,ul.address,ul.license FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_license ul ON u.phone = ul.phone WHERE u.id = #{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) a LEFT JOIN position pos on a.license = pos.license
